eprosima::rpc::transport::ServerTransport

eprosima::rpc::transport::ServerTransport Class Reference
[Transports]

This interface is the base of all classes that implement a transport that can be used by the server. More...

Detailed Description

This interface is the base of all classes that implement a transport that can be used by the server.
